snippet: Bryan Huffman, a close friend of the heiress Rachel Mellon, says he thought the donations Ms. Mellon made to John Edwards were strictly to help him become president.
abstract: Bryan Huffman, close friend of elderly heiress Rachel Mellon, takes the stand in the federal trial of John Edwards; Huffman details how he funneled nearly $750,000 from Mellon to Edwards aide Andrew Young, who in turn used the funds to cover up the candidate's extramarital affair.

byline.original: By WILLIAM DUPRE and KIM SEVERSON

lead_paragraph: Bryan Huffman, a close friend of the heiress Rachel Mellon, says he thought the donations Ms. Mellon made to John Edwards were strictly to help him become president.

headline.seo: Rachel Mellon’s Friend Testifies About Donations to Edwards
headline.main: Go-Between for Heiress Details Link to Edwards
